summary: Provides \"realistic\" and immersive ENB settings for your playing pleasure.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i157.photobucket.com/albums/t54/lawlsokewl88/equilibriumenb1.jpg[/img]


Presentation:
Provides \"realistic\" and immersive ENB settings for your playing pleasure. As you all know pictures are worth a wall of text. Yeah I know, it\'s Cheesy! 

Installation:
1 - Go to Boris Vorontsov\'s ENBseries and download \"ENBSeries v0.113 for TES Skyrim\" @ http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm (Or newer if updated^^)
2 - Extract only the wrappedVersion to your \"Skyrim\" folder.
3 - Download Equilibria ENB archive.
4 - Inside the Equilibria ENB archive you see a folder. INSIDE the folder is the files you want to copy/paste into your \"Skyrim\" folder.
5 - Go to C:\\Users\\(INSERT USERNAME)\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\SkyrimPrefs.ini. 
    Change: bFloatPointRenderTarget=0   to   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
5 - Run the game and enjoy!
 
Credits:
135g
Exurok
Captrandom


Special thanks to:
Boris Vorontsov\'s ENBseries 

NOTE!!!!
WE DO NOT TAKE KINDLY TO TROLLS AND CRITICISM! WE MADE THIS FOR OUR OWN TASTE! IF IT ISN\'T CONSTRUCTIVE CRITICISM WE WILL IGNORE YOUR COMMENT!
author: 135g
